group_1.narration: While searching for the Witch's Labyrinth@in Chuo Ward, we encountered another different Witch.
But I didn't have a single fear or concern.@Because I had new allies on my side!

group_1.textLeft: If our theory is correct, the Witch should be@somewhere around here...

group_1.textRight: [chara:301101:effect_ef_adv_01][se:7201_detect_magic]...Ah! Umika, I sensed a Witch!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300801:effect_ef_adv_01][se:7201_detect_magic]So did I!

group_1.textRight: [chara:301201:effect_ef_adv_01][se:7201_detect_magic]And I!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:401201:effect_ef_adv_01][se:7201_detect_magic]Ah, me too...@But the response is getting weaker.

group_1.textRight: Did it get away...?

group_1.textLeft: No, I think... it's been defeated.

group_1.textRight: Someone was fighting it?

group_1.textLeft: Yes... I recognize that magic just now.@I'm very familiar with it...

group_1.textRight: Ah, Umika!

group_1.textLeft: Akira...! Everyone...!
Looks like I finally found you, Kaoru.

group_1.textRight: ...A'ight, I think I've got all of it.
I knew you'd be all right out there, but you even@found some great friends!

group_1.textLeft: Yes. Some very dependable Magical Girls...
And I even met a future editor of mine, too.@Right, Kako?

group_1.textRight: Oh, no, I just...@All I did was talk to you.
But I'm even more interested in editing work now!

group_1.textLeft: I'll be looking forward to it.

group_1.textRight: Guess this means we'll be heading out to search for@Kazumi now.

group_1.textLeft: We'll keep searching on our end, too!

group_1.textRight: Yes, we'll let you know if we learn anything.

group_1.textLeft: I'm sure we'll find her in no time!

group_1.textRight: Kaoru!@"Go, fight, wiiiin!"

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I'll always remember that! Thank you!
Kako, Akira, Meiyui, thank you all so much!
Please send my regards to Nanaka, too...!

group_1.textRight: We will!
...Also, um... if it's alright with you... could I ask@for your autograph next time?

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: I know now's hardly the time, and it's a selfish@thing to ask...
But I'd just really like something to commemorate@meeting you...
C-could I get one, too?
I want one as well! I might just become a fan@from now on!
And... if you wouldn't mind...@could you sign one for Nanaka...?

group_1.textLeft: Once I get back to Asunaro, I'll send you all signed@copies of my newest release.

group_1.textRight: Really...?!
Um, but your newest release...?@What about your slump?

group_1.textLeft: Thanks to all of you, I've successfully escaped@from it.
I've got ideas for a new story welling up@one after another!

group_1.textRight: What kind of story?

group_1.textLeft: That's still a secret.@But the title will be...

group_1.textRight: It'll be...?

group_1.textLeft: "Another Daze".

group_1.textCenter: We'd better hurry before that Witch causes@any more chaos...!
